DataSourcePortable.Name: TILE_META_ANUAL_GERENTE_CONTAS
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT SUM(A.VALOR) PLANEJADO,
(SELECT SUM(VALORTOTAL+RECORRENTE+VALORSAAS) 
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES
WHERE YEAR(DATAFECHAMENTO) = YEAR(GETDATE())
AND STATUS = 10) REALIZADO,
@FILIAL as filial
FROM K_CRM_METASUSUARIOSTIPOS A
JOIN K_CRM_METASUSUARIOS B ON A.METAUSUARIO = B.HANDLE
JOIN K_CRM_METASPERIODOS C ON B.METAPERIODO = C.HANDLE
JOIN K_CRM_METASUNIDADES D ON C.METAUNIDADE = D.HANDLE
WHERE YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE())
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="PLANEJADO" From="A" Path="PLANEJADO" /> <Field Alias="REALIZADO" From="A" Path="REALIZADO" /> <Field Alias="FILIAL" From="A" Path="FILIAL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
